html:
12.29.19  9:35 am   i just binge-watched all bill wurtz vids. what do I do now? 

     make some of your own, and then i will have new ones for you to watch also

12.29.19  9:22 am   are u secretly a stone buddha

     yes oops not anymore

12.29.19  8:45 am   will you ever publish more of your music

     oh heck yeah

      i cannot wait for more

12.29.19  8:36 am   what are your thoughts on the letter h?

     it's a wonderful opportunity to breathe on someone

12.29.19  8:02 am   how do you manage to answer all the questions

     i have a question answering button. i actually have 2 so i can use both hands

12.29.19  7:51 am   What's the biggest mistake you have ever done? 

     not make enough mistakes

12.29.19  7:16 am   Do you enjoy answering those questions?

     they make me stronger, and i do enjoy being strong

      Or are they bunch of boring junk questions with few genius ones for you?

     it doesn't matter. the founding principle of this questions page is that i should be able to handle any question

12.29.19  6:50 am   Do you like the "?" symbol?

     yes

12.29.19  6:37 am   Did you have a good 2019?

     i'm not sure, i am more focused on the current year i am in, which is july 2019 - june 2020

12.29.19  5:12 am   I'm stuck in a position where I have to endure playing music in a band with poor musicians for another 20 days. It's painful and I cannot have fun. How should I change my thinking so that the 20 days will go by quickly?

     20 days will go by quickly no matter what. 20 days is a very short amount of time

12.29.19  5:02 am   Do you tell terrible truths or only the nice ones?

     i try to play it right down the middle

12.29.19  4:44 am   difference between a mailman and a postman??

     what country they are in

12.29.19  4:30 am   How many polar bears are in area 51 right now?

     (tommy lee jones voice) 'couple'

12.29.19  4:09 am   What's your favorite song you've made? 

      i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

12.29.19  3:37 am   what made you want to start answering questions?

     i thought it would make me stronger and more robust, physically. which so far it definitely has

12.29.19  3:32 am   is there anything wrong with the way internet browsers are made?

     there is no panic button. i always wanted to panic on the internet

12.29.19  2:13 am   what kind of question should i ask

     what kind of answer would you like to receive

12.29.19  2:05 am   What does it mean to live?

     you get to change, stay the same, and change between changing and staying the same

12.29.19  2:05 am   what is your process for coming up with music? I often either mess around on an instrument until I come up with something cool, or write and record lyrics in a few different takes and then try playing music around that until I settle on something I like. Is there a specific way you do it?

     yes. i've tried the first way you mentioned, which is the way i think a lot of people do it, but i ultimately realized that that does not play to my strengths as well as if i write the whole thing first. not all instrumental details, but the lyric/melody/chord/tempo/roadmap exactly

12.29.19  1:37 am   what's one of the hardest questions you've answered

     it's this one, because each time i write 'this one', i have to delete it because that makes it look way too easy. and even when i say all this, that makes it look easy also so i will have to delete all this, and then it becomes a very difficult question because then i would have written a lot and had to abandon it. but if i just explain my thinking process, it becomes easier through honesty. and yet unfortunately the honesty becomes compromised when you consider that the thesis of my statement was that this is a hard question

12.29.19  1:02 am   If I wanted to be the best wizard I can be, what should I do?

     forge your wizard ratings to way higher than they are, then try not to get caught

12.29.19  12:35 am   What do you think of Germany?

     never heard of it

12.29.19  12:26 am   how many keyboard maestro shortcuts do you have for variations of "i was going to say (x) but now that i think about it (y)"

     1

12.29.19  12:22 am   I don't have any good books to read, any suggestions? 

     try some videos

12.28.19  11:22 pm   i want to go to school because i'm stupid

     fair enough

12.28.19  11:10 pm   12.27.19  10:02 pm do you know the melody to with the states?

     i don't have a melody but there is usually a breath after montana

12.28.19  11:09 pm   i want to know the rights words and i think with enough practice ill find them.. but what if im afraid?

     words are actually very helpful for dealing with fear

12.28.19  10:30 pm   what's a chord progression you don't think has ever been used before?

     all of them have been not used before because you will never run out of ways to play even just one chord, but especially multiple chords in a list

12.28.19  10:09 pm   Is it helpful to know how to play a real instrument if I just want to make digital songs? Why or why not?

     i would highly recommend for you to acquaint yourself with the piano keyboard. that is one of the most powerful devices available for communicating vast amounts of musical information, very humanly and efficiently, to computers

12.28.19  9:42 pm   you're a very cool person with very cool music.

     holy smokes, you are very friendly

12.28.19  9:02 pm   How much cookies do you think would fit in India?

     500 trillion or less, depending on how much airspace you count

12.28.19  9:00 pm   What are you doing for the new year?

     i haven't entirely planned that far ahead

12.28.19  8:59 pm   When are you gonna mention Velcro 

     when it gains more acceptance in our society

12.28.19  8:26 pm   what does the giant flying spaghetti monster mean to you on a personal level

     nothing

12.28.19  8:21 pm   how to lrearn

     learning is automatic, as long as you patiently continue to do the things and go to the places

12.28.19  8:17 pm   In the video with Steve, what instrument(s) did you useto create the sound when Steve reads out loud the 2nd letter delivered by the bird?

     i thought there was only 1 letter

      Also, i may be asking a lot, but do you have a sample of it?

     i have the original thing

      Thank you for all the beautiful moments your songs have created in my life! :)

12.28.19  8:08 pm   how do i tell my friends important things that are difficult to say

     buy yourself some time by telling other people you are about to tell someone something

12.28.19  7:47 pm   How are you funny? How do you keep making the funny? Each one of these questions has the perfect funny answer. How do you do it?

     i am cursed

12.28.19  7:21 pm   opinions on music with non standard tunings? would you ever do it?

     no but i will un tune all day

12.28.19  7:04 pm   how do i make someone not hate me with a burning passion?

     you could try those political campaign signs

12.28.19  6:50 pm   What's your favourite kind of carrot. 

     adult carrot

12.28.19  6:02 pm   how strong is your blimp

     it is the 3rd strongest blimp, after the good and bad year blimps

12.28.19  5:55 pm   i just bought a used scarf, it is thick and green and red and yellow and black, and has a couple holes in it, what should i name it

      it's bad luck for me to name your scarf, but if you want to accept the bad luck then you can name it pumpkin

12.28.19  5:54 pm   would you be ok with sharing the current reading of the countdown timer?

     that could be arranged

12.28.19  4:55 pm   what are in an lake?

     some trash,

12.28.19  4:43 pm   Are what you really claim to be ?

     yes but on top of that i also make fictional claims sometimes

12.28.19  4:41 pm   how do i escape the dullness of this mundane life

     all the tools for interestingness is right there in the dullness. it's still dull because you haven't used it yet

12.28.19  3:58 pm   Why is the fact that R is your favorite letter a rumor??

     someone asked me for a favorite letter which i don't have so i held up a mirror and that was just what letter reflected off the mirror at that particular time

12.28.19  3:51 pm   is it annoying to answer all these questions 

     it makes me stronger but sometimes i am annoyed by all the strength

12.28.19  3:21 pm   i broke a mirror, now what?

     sulk into it, just because you don't often get the chance
